sentence.Network_en: Its ingredients include Xanthium fruit, magnolia flower, wild chrysanthemum and licorice root.
sentence.Network_cn: 其成份包括苍耳子 、 木兰花 、 野菊花和甘草.

sentence.Network_en: Objective : To screen the extraction process of volatile oil in Xanthium Powder.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的: 筛选加味苍耳子散挥发油提取工艺.

sentence.Network_en: Conclusion: The resources of medicinal plant Xanthium may be appropriately expanded.
sentence.Network_cn: 结论: 苍耳子药用植物资源可适当扩大.
